mapper.select: SELECT b.FD_NAME, c.NAME, c.JOBNUMBER, b.FD_ID,c.USERID FROM EKPUSER.DINGTALK_USER c LEFT JOIN SYS_ORG_ELEMENT a ON c.JOBNUMBER = a.FD_NO LEFT JOIN SYS_ORG_ELEMENT b ON SUBSTR(a.FD_HIERARCHY_ID, INSTR(a.FD_HIERARCHY_ID, 'x', 1, 2) + 1, INSTR(a.FD_HIERARCHY_ID, 'x', 1, 3) - INSTR(a.FD_HIERARCHY_ID, 'x', 1, 2) - 1) = b.FD_ID AND b.FD_ID != a.FD_ID
